unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Try again later or contact support.
reset_link_expired: The password could not be reset. Probably the reset link from your email has expired.
password_saved: Your new password has been saved.
close_window: You can now close this window.
confirm_email_success: Thank you for confirming your email address!
confirm_email_failed: Your email address could not be confirmed. Probably the link from your email has expired.
invalid_credentials: The email address or password is incorrect.
account_inactive: Your account is no longer active.
account_blocked: Your account is temporarily blocked because you entered a wrong password too many times. Try again later.
password_too_short: The password must be at least 6 characters
no_repeat_password_match: The passwords are not the same
create_account_email_exists: A user with this email address already exists
email_address_pending_verification_1: You have changed your email address and a confirmation mail was sent to your new address:
email_address_pending_verification_2: The change will only become active after you have confirmed the new address.
start_download_empty: You are not a member of a project where you can download data.
